RelatedSentence: Lenku said the immigrants are still getting into the country through Moyale and Mandera and hiding in counties like Isiolo before being ferried to Nairobi .

Principal Secretary Mutea Iringo and Eastern Regional Commissioner Claire Omollo accompanied Lenku in the meeting that was attended bymore than 500 administrators .
